properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Uvipokee) Uvipokee.
vipaji vyetu Baba twaleta.
ee Baba pokea uvipokee.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Zawadi hizi twaleta Baba,
uzitakase zikupendeze Bwana.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nasi tutoe sisi
wenyewe wana wako,
twaleta kwa moyo
wa upendo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ndiyo mazao
ya jasho letu,
nasi twakushukuru
pokea shukurani.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nafsi zetu
tunatoa upendo,
tujali neema na upendo.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Twakutolea
na nyoyo zetu
twajiunga na Yesu
Mwokozi wetu sisi.
